documents.document:
Will there be the 5th season of Soutland?

This show is really great for watching and I love it so much so I wonder whether there will be the fifth season of the show.

A1: Actually, there will be the 5 season of the show and on May 4, 2012, the 5th season of the show has renewed ten-episode. I have just finished the complete seasons on Southland DVD. It really great!

comes from: http://ronnyjohn9.blog.com/2012/07/09/will-there-be-the-5th-season-of-soutland/
more classic tv series on dvd:dexter dvd,breaking dvd

What should I start watching - The Mentalist or Southland?

I wants to pick one of the DVD and I don’t know which one should I pick, the mentalist dvd or southland dvd?

A3: I watched both the two and they are really good. But if I had to pick one, I will choose southland dvd because the is the cop show that different other cop shows. If you watch it, you will love it!
more tv series on dvd: dexter dvd,breaking dvd

Which season of Family Guy should I start watching?

My friend told me that Family Guy is a nice cartoon for watching during the leisure time, but I haven’t watched it yet. Do I need to watch it from the first episode?

A1: Actually, there is not so many relationships from one episode to another so you don’ have to watch it from the first episode, but I recommend that you should watch from the first episode because it is really funny for watching! I finished all the complete seasons 1-10 on Family Guy DVD. Great!
comes from: http://livon.tv/activity/p/76840/
you may love these DVDs: the wire dvd, doctor who

Does anyone else think that Family Guy is the funniest show

I think family guy must be the funniest TV show for watching, but my sister doesn’t agree with me. What is your idea on it? Dost anyone else have the same feelings with me?

A3: Every time something happens too me, it always puts me in mind of Family Guy. My sis, her husband, and I were at the store and they reminded me of the episode where Peter is like "I want this one and this on and this one" and Lois is like "No, you're only getting two candy bars." Everything puts me in mind of Family Guy DVD so much its scary.
you may love these DVDs: the wire dvd, doctor who

How can I watch American Horror Story from the start?

There is only 1 season of American Horror story, and I watched American Horror Story DVD. This is a nice TV show for watching. The complete first season has 12 episodes for watching!
comes from: http://www.dvdsea.com/products/American-Horror-Story-Season-1-DVD-Box-Set-DVDS-2850.html
excellent TV series dvds for you: The big bang theory DVD, spartacus DVD

Is there going to be an american horror story season 2?

Definitely, there will be a second season of the show. After watching the American Horror Story DVD season 1, I have been waiting the second season for a long time. But the second season will be set in an entirely new city and the second season will have the new character also.
The big bang theory DVD, spartacus DVD

In NCIS seasons 9 there was an episode i cannot mind?

Life beofre his eyes and Playing with fire. There was a scene where Gibbs says to someone about staying safe, something to do with tides. I would love to know this quote because I want it maybe as a tattoo, can someone please tell me they know what i am talking about and tell me the quote please

A1: I definitely wouldn't want to get this wrong, esp if it's gonna be something that you're going to have tattooed on you, so could you give us some more info? I checked and there are 8 episodes between "Life Before His Eyes" and "Playing with Fire". I'm a huge NCIS DVD fan, have seen every episode at least twice...won’t even talk about how many times I've seen some of the early season episodes that are on all the time on USA.
comes from: http://www.dvdsea.com/products/NCIS-Seasons-1-9-DVD-Box-Set-DVDS-2955.html
more TV series on: game of thrones dvd, fringe dvd

How many seasons does ncis have right now?

I want to know how many seasons ncis have right now! I have just finished the first three seasons and I think it is a nice tv show so I want to buy the NCIS DVD.

A2: The TV show has 9 seasons now and the complete seasons 1-9 dvd box set is available now. I love the show very much.
more TV series on: game of thrones dvd, fringe dvd

What do you think of the tv series the Golden Girls? Do you

I love watching The Golden Girls. I bought The Golden Girls DVD for my sister and she loves it so much. What do you think of the tv series the Golden Girls? Do you love the show?

A1: I love it! I live a sad life. Its a bit cheesy sometimes but if you get into it its funny and witty. It isn't just a program about old women. It’s a classic american tv show. Millions tuned in to see its finale when it was first on TV.
discount dvd store sale for cheap: The big bang theory dvd, modern family dvd
comes from: http://www.bebo.com/c/profile/profile_feed?MemberId=11047805454

What is your favorite season of The Golden Girls?

After watch the golden girls seasons 1 to 7, I found this is a good tv show for watching! All the seasons are very good but I love the season 5 most. What about you?

A3: I have all The Golden Girls DVD as a matter of fact I am watching the final season right now. Personally, I like pretty much all of them.

discount dvd store sale for cheap: The big bang theory dvd, modern family dvd
comes from: http://andybogo.hyves.nl/whowhatwhere/

Who are the two actresses who play Carol Tobin and Tessa Ma

After watching Damages DVD, I love these two characters Carol Tobin and Tessa Marchetti, so I want to know these two actresses.

A1: Here is the information you wanted: Carol Tobin is portrayed by ANA REEDER. Tessa Marchetti is portrayed by VANESSA RAY

comes from: http://www.bebo.com/c/profile/profile_feed?MemberId=11047805454
dvd boxset shop: fringe dvd, boardwalk empire dvd

How many seasons are the TV series Damages?

I have finished all the seasons 1-4 on Damages DVD, and I wonder how many season the show will have.

A3: It is said that Damages season 5 is on air and it is the final season of the show! The 5th season of the show began airing July 11, 2012.
comes from: http://andybogo.hyves.nl/whowhatwhere/
